A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been watching star wars my entire life\, I watch all of them twice every single year\, and I have to say\, I absolutely LOVED The Last Jedi. everything about it felt thought out and well done\, Mark Hamill was excellent\, John Boyega's character has seen massive character development\, Rey's character has also improved greatly\, Adam driver brings excellent acting and emotion to Kylo Ren's inner turmoil\, in short\, the whole cast performed phenomenally\, and I've already preordered this movie. if you're a star wars fan\, and have been since the beginning\, you will love this movie with all your heart
